column5: I had a list and i got everything on it! I had to get my hands on these new Rapala X-Rap Shad Shallow crankbaits and i did. One of them has a sure set hook, the other does not.  Pictures:    I can not wait for the spring fishing classic sales to come
good selection of those baits you got there. Like you I can't wait till the spring, but not for the sales, just open water.  hope those crankbaits work well for you,
Cant wait for the ,,,,Hey what happen,they said sure set hook.  Nice collection MTBF
Nice stuff! I have soft water and the Bass season is open...If you would like to send them to me, I would be happy to water test them for you...GRIN.

Hey nice lures . I got a couple x raps yesterday ... i chose the ones without the sure set hook.. to me it looks more like a snagger haha also i bet they catch the weeds alot more ... I also got the same worm hooks ... great minds think alike !!!!!!

Nice haul bud !!!!...that purple ghost color x-rap is a great walleye bait !!!   and in the early spring the kings on lake ontario go nuts on it too,i will have to get a few of those shallows raps too,in the skinny water at dusk they should be a killer !!! cheers
oops lol, well if there was any confusion i guess it's cleared up.
Great stuff!!! lol now you have like what? 9 x raps?  but your totally set for spring!!!! I gotta get myself some x raps as well
